instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3209 no green light
threads.message:
820-3209 no green light
I have no other dc board to test but I have another working 3209 board and it works with customer dc board. So it is not DC BOARD.
I am confused what to do next as one wire circuite is not on main board.

I checked ACOK pin 14 isl6259 and it is 3.3V
PPBUS - 8.39V
Board is no liquide damage. Pretty clean. Customer told me one day stoped working. I heated SMC a little but no change.
SMC_Adapter_EN - 3.3V
SMC_BC_ACOK - 3.3V
smc_reset_L - 3.3V

What more to check?

threads.title: 820-3209 no green light
threads.message:
LIO conector on the board?
Check the pins and traces...

threads.title: 820-3209 no green light
threads.message: Got 3V on center pin of charger on the LIO board?

threads.title: 820-3209 no green light
threads.message: Now I have green light, but still not power.

threads.title: 820-3209 no green light
threads.message: Voltage on PPBUS_G3H now that green light is on???

threads.title: 820-3209 no green light
threads.message: PPBUS voltage? Voltage on L7260? Voltage on C1802/03?
